text: wqal hwla' almshrkwn: ma alhayat 'iilaa hayatuna aldunya alty nahn fyha, la hayat swaha; tkdhyba minhum balbeth baed almmat, wama yuhlikuna 'iilaa mrr allyaly walayam wtwl alemr; 'inkarana minhum 'an yakun lahum rabi yfnyhm wyhlkhm, wama lhwla' almushrikin min eilm bdhlk, maa hum 'iilaa yatakalamun balzn walwhm walkhyal
